text: Me and My Gal is a 1932 American romantic comedy drama movie directed by Raoul Walsh and starring Spencer Tracy, Marion Burns, Joan Bennett, George Walsh, George Chandler, Noel Madison, Adrian Morris, Jesse De Vorska. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was remade in 1940 as Pier 13. ==Other websites== * *Me and My Gal at the TCM Movie Database *Me and My Gal at Allmovie Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:1930s comedy-drama movies Category:1930s romantic comedy movies Category:1932 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Raoul Walsh
title: Me and My Gal
